H0.text: Late British singer-songwriter John Simon Ritchie was better known by what name. Johnny Rotten

H1.text: Late British singer-songwriter John Simon Ritchie was better known by what name. Simon Ritchie

H2.text: Late British singer-songwriter John Simon Ritchie was better known by what name. John Riot

H3.text: Late British singer-songwriter John Simon Ritchie was better known by what name. Sid vicious

A4.text: Lydon gave Ritchie the nickname 'Sid Vicious'.
